title: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
description: Bug 24411[Welcome] Mouse click on link should select link
OB: When clicking on a link in the welcome page, the clicked link is not selected when returning to the welcome page.
EB: When clicking on a link in the welcome page, the clicked link should be selected when returning to the welcome page.
SR: Update the code logic to ensure that when a link in the welcome page is clicked, it is selected when the user returns to the welcome page.
